forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon bathes the city in sunlight, wrapping the streets in a gentle glow, inviting passersby to enjoy the clear skies and mild temperatures. With a high approaching 61 degrees, the cool yet crisp embrace of a westerly breeze—ranging between 7 to 14 mph—adds a refreshing touch to the day, rustling the leaves of the trees and encouraging a leisurely stroll. The absence of a marine layer keeps the vistas expansive, offering unobstructed views of the iconic Golden Gate and the city’s skyline, while the horizon melts into an endless azure.

As twilight approaches, a shift is anticipated; the sun will cast a softer light across the landscape, and with it, partly cloudy skies will take over, introducing a cozy ambiance by evening’s arrival. Expect temperatures to dip to around 51 degrees, prompting a light jacket or sweater to ward off the cool night air. This transition invites possibilities—perhaps a quiet evening walk along the Embarcadero, savoring a warm cup of coffee at a cherished café, or gathering with friends for a casual dinner. The clarity of the day makes it a perfect time to explore the hidden corners of the city, with the charm of autumn whispering through the streets.
